text: MTV Unplugged is the first EP recorded by American singer-songwriter Mariah Carey. It was released on June 2, 1992. ==Track listing== ==Charts and certifications== ===Charts=== Chart (1992) Peak position Australian Albums Chart 7 Austrian Albums Chart 21 Canadian RPM Albums Chart 6 Australian Albums Chart 7 Dutch Albums Chart 1 French Albums Chart 17 German Albums Chart 20 Japanese Albums Chart 13 New Zealand Albums Chart 1 Norwegian Albums Chart 18 Swedish Albums Chart 32 Swiss Albums Chart 19 UK Albums Chart 3 US Billboard 200 3 ===Certifications=== Country (Provider) Certification (sales thresholds) Australia (ARIA) Platinum Canada (CRIA) Platinum France (SNEP) 2× Gold Netherlands (NVPI) 2× Platinum New Zealand (RIANZ) 2× Platinum Switzerland (IFPI) Gold United Kingdom (BPI) Gold United States (RIAA) 3× Platinum === Singles === Year Single Peak chart positions Certifications (sales thresholds) US US R&B; US AC AUS CAN FRA GER IRE NL NZ SWE SWI UK 1992 "I'll Be There" 1 11 1 9 1 16 33 3 1 1 26 20 2 * NZ: Gold "If It's Over" — — — — — — — — 80 — — — — "—" denotes releases that did not chart or was not released. == References == Category:Mariah Carey albums Category:1992 albums Category:Gospel albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Live albums Category:Columbia Records albums
title: MTV Unplugged (Mariah Carey EP)
